title:
The right cancellation property for certain classes of dendroidal
  anodynes
abstract:
We generalize a previous result of Stevenson to the category of dendroidal
sets, yielding the right cancellation property of dendroidal inner anodynes
within the class of normal monomorphisms. As an application of this property,
we show how to construct a symmetric monoidal $\infty$-category
$\mathsf{Env}(X)^\otimes$ from a dendroidal $\infty$-operad $X$, in a way that
generalizes the symmetric monoidal envelope of a coloured operad.
